page.title: 18How I spend my spare time
page.content:
{ # 1} I usually help my Dad or Mum. I chop some logs for the fire and help Dad to put up some pens for our chickens. I set some mouse traps to kill them because they eat our chicken food in the shed. My Dad gives me 5p for each mouse I catch. When the chicken shed is dirty I clean it out.
{# 2 }In my spare time I either go and play in the island over the road or watch television most of the time. Sometimes I get a book out and trace pictures and colour them in with felt tip pens or I use my sister's poster paints. Or I read my school reading book - my favourite books which I have read are Little Grey Men, Anne Frank and Charlotte's Web.
